Information..........: Soundtrack to the 1998 film Armageddon. Features "I Don't Want to Miss A Thing" written by Diane Warren and performed by Aerosmith; it has been the only number one hit in the bands career. It also features the song "Remember Me" as performed by Journey. This song marks the first studio recording with the bands new lead vocalist, Steve Augeri, who replaced Steve Perry as lead vocalist shortly after Perry was dismissed from the band due to touring problems caused by hip surgery.
